VIDEO: Novinarka in voditeljica v hudi stiski, pri javljanju v živo izvedela novico
Dejansko so ji ob javljanju v program v živo povedali diagnozo. 
02 Nov 2019, 20:21 by Ma. M.
»Imam ogromno vprašanj, na katera nimam odgovorov. Prihodnji teden grem na dodatni pregled, da bi potrdili diagnozo in izvedeli več o tumorju, s katerim se soočam,« je v solzah pri javljanju v živo povedala novinarka in voditeljica Ali Mayer (41).Novinarka televizije KFOR iz Oklahome je bila na še enem izmed mnogih vklopov v živo v oddajo, a njeno življenje se je v trenutku spremenilo. Oglašala se je iz lokalne bolnišnice in poročala o pomembnosti mamografije za ženske. Sama se je dala preveriti in doživela šok. Povedali so ji, da ima raka dojke.Novinarka je navkljub temu oddelala svoje delo pred kamero in razkrila diagnozo, ki jo je izvedela nekaj minut prej.

VIDEO: A journalist and presenter in dire need of a news release when reporting live
In fact, she was told a diagnosis when reporting to the live program.
02 Nov 2019, 19:21 by Ma. M.
“I have a lot of questions that I have no answers to. Next week, I will go for an additional examination to confirm the diagnosis and find out more about the tumor I am facing, "journalist and presenter Ali Mayer, 41, said in tears. from many live appearances on the show, but her life changed in an instant. She advertised from a local hospital and reported the importance of mammography for women. She gave herself a check and was shocked. She was told she had breast cancer. The journalist nevertheless separated her work in front of the camera and revealed the diagnosis she had made a few minutes earlier.
